messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] FAQ Database
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/6/04 12:43:57 PM, garrisonstuber@bellsouth.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/6/04 12:43:57 PM, garrisonstuber@... writes:

<< I only put in two database items (Question and

Answer), and I didn't begin any records, but it might be useful to

begin putting things in as they strike you, as a sort of ad hoc

brainstorming, and a place where anyone/everyone can contribute. >>

No, that's not going to be helpful at all. Sorry. Please check next time.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] FAQ Database

<< PS--How long *is* the "new person moderation" in effect for? I'm
